g.text: The workflow below accesses life expectancy data for countries and regions. The bar chart shows the
average life expectancy values by regions, and the choropleth world map shows the life expectancy
values by countries. Your task is to build an IF switch that controls which of the two visualizations is
1.1) Create a Single Selection Configuration node with two options: "Regions" and "Countries"
1.3) Use an IF switch to separate the two workflow branches. Control the active port by the flow
1.4) Encapsulate the nodes into a component. Select
configuration dialog. Execute and open the component's view. Do you see the right graph?
The workflow below accesses life expectancy data for countries and regions. The bar chart shows the
average life expectancy values by regions, and the choropleth world map shows the life expectancy
values by countries. Your task is to build an IF switch that controls which of the two visualizations is
1.1) Create a Single Selection Configuration node with two options: "Regions" and "Countries"
1.3) Use an IF switch to separate the two workflow branches. Control the active port by the flow
1.4) Encapsulate the nodes into a component. Select
configuration dialog. Execute and open the component's view. Do you see the right graph?
